violations.title: Pre-consent Tracking Script Execution
violations.description: Tracking scripts executed before user consent obtained
violations.businessImpact: Unlawful processing of personal data, potential fines up to â‚¬20M
violations.remediation: Implement consent-gated script loading using CMP integration

violations.title: Missing Reject Option
violations.description: No clear mechanism to reject non-essential cookies
violations.businessImpact: Consent not freely given, entire consent framework invalid
violations.remediation: Add prominent "Reject All" button with equal visual weight to "Accept"

violations.title: Accept-only Banner Design
violations.description: Banner designed to nudge users toward acceptance only
violations.businessImpact: Consent not freely given, potential regulatory investigation
violations.remediation: Redesign banner with neutral language and equal choice prominence

violations.title: Consent Bypass Vulnerability
violations.description: Technical methods detected to bypass consent mechanism
violations.businessImpact: Systematic GDPR violations, potential criminal liability
violations.remediation: Implement server-side consent validation and audit trails

violations.title: Insufficient Cookie Information
violations.description: Incomplete or unclear cookie purpose descriptions
violations.businessImpact: Lack of transparency, potential user complaints and fines
violations.remediation: Provide detailed cookie tables with purpose, duration, and data controller

recommendations.action: Implement consent-gated loading for all tracking technologies
Add prominent "Reject All" button to consent banner
recommendations.impact: Ensures freely given consent, critical for GDPR compliance

legalAnalysis.legalRisk: HIGH - Fundamental consent violations detected. Immediate remediation required.
legalAnalysis.regulatoryAction: Regulatory investigation risk if user complaints filed. Priority remediation advised.
legalAnalysis.fineExposure: Up to â‚¬20M or 4% of annual turnover for systematic consent violations
